titleStmt.title: Sanskrit Manuscripts in the Bodleian Libraries
titleStmt.funder: The cataloguing of this item was made possible through a benefaction from the late John P. Clay, founder and benefactor of the Clay Sanskrit Library.

msDesc.head: A composite manuscript containing twelve manuscript works on kāvya, bound together upon their arrival in the Bodleian Library.

binding.p: Early 20th-century brown textile binding over pasteboard, with shelfmark and description tooled in gold on the spine. Cardboard cover box.

history.acquisition: Donated by Shum Shere, Chandra Mahārāja Chandra Shamsher Jang Bahadur Rana in 1909.

recordHist.source: Description by Barbora Sojkova, based on observation of the manuscript and existing descriptions.

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Saṃskṛtamañjarī, composed by Raghunātha Bhaṭṭa.

msItem.title: Saṃskṛtamañjarī
msItem.rubric: F. 3v [f. 1v in original foliation]: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ ||
msItem.colophon: Ff. 12r-12v [f. 10r-10v in original foliation]: iti saṃskṛtamaṃjarisaṃpūrṇe | śūbham astu pakṣāṣu nāgaśaśisamvatavikramasya māsorjja yakṣaśitanāgatithau vāregūrau[?]vāsavabhemṛrocalgte tathāyogayutebhruvāravye gosvāmisārthalikhitaṃ śivena

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

handNote.desc: Devanāgarī in black ink. Daṇḍas in red ink. Corrections in yellow powder.

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title on f. 1v, top left margin.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: A complete paper manuscript of the Girvāṇapadamañjarī of Varadarāja.

msItem.note: Author's name is given as Varadabhaṭṭa.
msItem.title: Girvāṇapadamañjarī
msItem.rubric: F. 13v [f. 1v in original foliation]: śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ
msItem.incipit: F. 13v [f. 1v in original foliation]: aremayāsnānārthaṃ gamyate |
msItem.colophon: F. 26 [f. 14r in original foliation]: arevāmanāśramayadyataṃ tatsarvaṃ bhuktaṃ | mayāsvāminaḥ | mama yaddas tu bhukṣaṇayogyaṃ deva mayā bhuktaṃ svāminaḥ || kṛtā var[a]dabhaṭṭena gīrvāṇapadaṃjārīkṛtaṃ || saṃvat 1857 śrī viśveśvarāyarānamaḥ ||

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margins, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: The manuscript was removed by the curator Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry.

msItem.title: Prākṛtasaṃskṛta
msItem.note: Manuscript note in pen on f. 35r reads: "The work formerly in here called Prākṛtasaṃskṛta was not on grammar and has been removed.”

msContents.summary: A composite paper manuscript of Aniṭkārikāvyākhyāna of Vyāghrabhūti, with the last leaf being the complete Veṭkārikā.

msItem.title: Aniṭkārikāvyākhyāna
msItem.incipit: F. 36r [ff. 2r in original foliation] ragati vṛdhyoḥ || īṅavihāyasāṃgatau |
msItem.colophon: F. 39r [ff. 5r in original foliation] ity aniṭakārikāvyakhyānasaṃ[?]pataḥ samāpteti ||

msItem.title: Veṭkārikā
msItem.colophon: F. 39v [f. 5v in original foliation]: iti veṭkārikāsamāsā || || śubhaṃ[bha]vatu || ||

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

condition.p: First folio is missing, with original foliation starting with 2.

additions.note: Includes marginal notes and corrections in two different hands.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: A complete paper manuscript of the Liṅgānuśāsana by Hemacandra.

msItem.title: Liṅgānuśāsana
msItem.colophon: F. 41v [f. 1v in original foliation]: ityāvārya śrī hemacaṃdraviracitaṃ svopajñaliṃgānuṣāsanaṃ samāptam ||

supportDesc.foliation: Jainanāgarī numerals, bottom-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

handNote.desc: Jainanāgarī in black ink. Ruled in red ink. Highlighted in red powder.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: A complete paper manuscript of the Laghuvṛtti of Manasārāma Śarman.

msItem.title: Laghuvṛtti
msItem.incipit: f. 49v gaṇeśaṃ girijākāṃ taṃ gopagopī janeśvaraṃ natvāphaṇīśaṃ vakṣyehaṃ vṛttiṃ sārasvatīṃ laghuṃ 1
msItem.colophon: f. 71v || iti kvatpādaḥ || sarasvatī prasādāptasārasvarasamṛddhye laghuvṛttiḥ kvatā ceyaṃ manasārāma śarmanā || śubhaṃyāt saṃvat 1837 śā 1 ghra 2 [?]ā śu 4 bhṛgau sāyaṃ bhū

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

handNote.desc: Devanāgarī in black and red ink. Highlighted in red powder.

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title on top left margin, verso.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of the Girvāṇapadamañjarī of Varadarāja.

msItem.title: Girvāṇapadamañjarī
msItem.rubric: F. 73v [f. 1v in original foliation]: || śrī gaṇeśāya namaḥ ||
msItem.colophon: F. 83v [f. 12v in original foliation]: iti gīvaṇipadamajarāsamāptā || saṃvat 1763 caitra sud[...]

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

condition.p: Fol. 9 in original foliation is missing.
In good condition. Water damage on f. 83v [f. 12v in original foliation], but akṣaras are readable.

handNote.desc: Devanāgarī in black ink. Highlighted in red powder.

additions.note: Includes marginal notes, corrections, and colophon written in a different hand.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of Aniṭkārikā with the commentary of Aniṭkārikāvyākhyāna of Vyāghrabhūti.

msItem.title: Aniṭkārikā
msItem.rubric: ff. 85v-85v [ff. 1v-2v in original foliation) śrī haraye namaḥ ||

msItem.title: Aniṭkārikāvyākhyāna
msItem.note: The commentary is also known as Vaiyāghrabhūtikārikāvṛtti

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title, top left and bottom right margins, verso.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of Aniṭkārikā with the commentary of Aniṭkārikāvyākhyāna of Vyāghrabhūti. The verso of the last folio contains an unidentified verse in a different hand.

msItem.title: Aniṭkārikā
msItem.rubric: f. 88v [ff. 1v in original foliation) śrī sāmvaśivāyanamaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: f. 88v [ff. 1v in original foliation) || seḍaniḍvibhāgaḥ || aniḍiti | svarāntodhāturaniḍ bhavati tīddaśyatāṃ anupunaḥ umānseṭaḥ [...]
msItem.colophon: f. 90r [ff. 3r in original foliation) iti vaiyyāghrabhūtikārikādṛttiḥ samāpti magaman || śubham asti kārttikavadī 1 vandvāsareñubham bhūyāt likhitaṃnalakṣīnārāyaṇe

msItem.title: Aniṭkārikāvyākhyāna
msItem.note: The commentary is also known as Vaiyāghrabhūtikārikāvṛtti
msItem.rubric: f. 88v [ff. 1v in original foliation) śrī ganeśāya namaḥ ||

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

layout.note: Commentary layout: tripāṭha; mūla cited in full.

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title, top left and bottom right margins, verso.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: A paper manuscript of Vanamālimiśra's Vaiyākaraṇasiddhāntattvaviveka.

msItem.title: Vaiyākaraṇasiddhāntattvaviveka
msItem.rubric: F. 92v [f. 1v in original foliation]: namo vighrachiṭṭa

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and bottom-right margin, verso. Not extant on all folios.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

condition.p: Incomplete, with the text suddenly breaking off.
F. 105v, originally foliated as f. 13, is written in a different hand.
In good condition. Occassional water damage or ink smudges, with most akṣaras being readible.

handNote.desc: Devanāgarī in black ink. Highlighted in red powder.

additions.p: Abbreviated marginal title, bottom right margins, verso.
Marginal notes in a different hand.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: An incomplete paper manuscript of the Vākyavāda by Acala Upādhyāya, followed by a previously undescribed and unidentified manuscript in a different hand.

msItem.author: Acala Upādhyāya>
msItem.title: Vākyavāda
msItem.note: Title known from marginal initials "vā" and "vākyavā"
msItem.rubric: F. 156v [f. 1v in original foliation] śrī śivāya namaḥ
msItem.incipit: F. 156v [f. 1v in original foliation] atha kim idaṃ vākyaṃ nāma

msItem.title: Unidentified fragment
msItem.rubric: F. 158r [f. 1r in original foliation]: śrī vekaṭeśātaya namaḥ ||
msItem.incipit: F. 158r [f. 1r in original foliation] vyākhyānatoviśeṣapratipatir nahisaṃdeādalakṣaṇaṃ 1
msItem.colophon: F. 160r [original foliation missing] śrī vekaṭeśaprasadya || || || || hastākṣarāṇimāṣāṣacasya |||

supportDesc.foliation: Devanāgarī numerals, top-left and top-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

additions.p: Abbreviated title in the margin of the first manuscript item.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

msContents.summary: An incomplete paper manuscript of the shorter version of the Sārasvatīprakriyā by Anubhūtisvarūpācārya.

msItem.title: Sārasvatīprakriyā
msItem.rubric: F. 162v [f. 1v in original foliation]: oṃ namaḥ ||
msItem.colophon: F. 190v [f. 1v in original foliation]: iti śrīpnatyaramahaṃ sayaribrātakaṃkāvārya śrīñpranunūtisvarūpācāryaviracitā sārasvatīprakriyāsaṃpūṇā ||

supportDesc.foliation: Jainanāgarī numerals, bottom-right margin, verso.
Arabic numerals in pencil, bottom-right corner, recto (added by Gambier-Parry, Thomas Thomas Gambier-Parry); this foliation starts with the first flyleaf).

condition.p: Missing leaves. The Pañcaratna is missing three verses. The Ṣaḍratna is missing 4 verses, and the Navaratna is missing f. 1 with the first verse.

handNote.desc: Jainanāgarī in black ink. Highlighted in red powder.

decoNote.desc: Marginal illustrations in black ink on f. 165v and 178. Drawstring miniatures in black and red ink on f. 183v and 190v.

additions.p: Marginal notes and glosses in a different hand.

availability.p: Entry to read in the Library is permitted only on presentation of a valid reader's card, for admissions procedures contact Bodleian Libraries' Admissions Office.

analytic.title: A Handlist of the Vyākaraṇa Manuscripts in the Chandra Shum Shere Collection Preserved in the Bodleian Library.

category.catDesc: General teaching on ethics and particular ethical topics
Narrative literature relating to the Jinas, early Jain teachers, and individual characters
